ygData.subject: RE: Planes, here I come...
ygData.msgSnippet: same here.  a few weeks ago the consensus was to stop playing songs when pulling, but i was in hate for 15 hours last week (finally killed Inno for first time
ygData.messageBody:
same here. a few weeks ago the consensus was to stop playing songs when
pulling, but i was in hate for 15 hours last week (finally killed Inno for
first time on our server) and i specifically asked if i needed to worry
about playing songs during pulls. everyone said no. i was not in the
pullers group, as you said. the one thing that trained us badly was a stuck
golem pet, kept aggro'ing all kinds of stuff. if you see a golem come with
no pet, not good. finally got arms though, which suck compared to mithril
but full imbrued looks pretty cool.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L34 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> I've been starting to go to hate regularily now. I play my
> full range of
> songs, and don't experience any problems at all. Mind you,
> we usually keep
> bards out of the puller's group, but other than that, I don't
> know that we
> do anything special. One of the recent trips, I didn't even
> die once in
> about 10 hours on the plane.
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 50 Bard of Erollisi Marr
